block.p: April Pazienza Wahlestedt, the daughter of Beth Catherwood of Hudson, Fla., and James A. Pazienza of Chevy Chase, Md., is to be married today to David Luke Palmerlee, the son of Susan and David F. Palmerlee of Buffalo, Wyo. The Rev. Lynn C. Wright is to perform the ceremony at the Episcopal Chapel of the Transfiguration in Jackson Hole, Wyo.

The bride is the director of communications at the Council on Foreign Relations, the policy research institute in New York. She graduated from Georgetown University and received a master's degree in international affairs from Columbia University. Her father is the chief executive of Uniglobe Full Service Travel, a travel agency in Washington. The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bridegroom's.

April Pazienza Wahlestedt, the daughter of Beth Catherwood of Hudson, Fla., and James A. Pazienza of Chevy Chase, Md., is to be married today to David Luke Palmerlee, the son of Susan and David F. Palmerlee of Buffalo, Wyo. The Rev. Lynn C. Wright is to perform the ceremony at the Episcopal Chapel of the Transfiguration in Jackson Hole, Wyo.

The bride is the director of communications at the Council on Foreign Relations, the policy research institute in New York. She graduated from Georgetown University and received a master's degree in international affairs from Columbia University. Her father is the chief executive of Uniglobe Full Service Travel, a travel agency in Washington. The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bridegroom's.

Mr. Palmerlee, who is known as Luke, is an associate director in New York at Cushman & Wakefield, the real estate services company, where he is a real-estate management consultant. He graduated from Yale University. His father, a lawyer, practices in Buffalo.
